content:
Please redirect me if this is not the appropriate place for this issue.

In order to add a FHIR-related bug, I attempted to register a new HL7 account. After filling out the registration form, I saw the message that a confirmation email was sent. After several hours no email was received so I verified our SPAM filters did not capture it. I made 2 more attempts to have the confirmation emails resent. Again they were not received nor did they appear in our SPAM filters. I then attempted to re-create my account in case I mis-spelled my email address but the registration attempt reported that my email address was already in use, so I canceled the attempt to re-create the account.

How can I get this resolved?
Thanks...
so this is a gForge account? @Lloyd McKenzie

Hi Joe,

I've sent you an email. Please reply when you get it and I'll activate you manually.
